title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8134.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8134.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 31
between Route 63 and the Orleans-Niagara county line in the Town of Shelby and

Village of Medina. (b) Route 98. Route 98 between the Genesee-Orleans county line and Route 104, in the Towns of

Barre, Albion and Gaines, and the Village of Albion. (c) Route 279 between Route 98 and Route 18
in the Towns of Gaines and Carlton. (d) [Eff. until Feb. 1, 1989, see also
subd. (d) below.] Route 104. Route
104 between the Monroe-Orleans county line and Route 63 in the Towns of

Ridgeway, Gaines and Murray. (d) [Eff. Feb. 1, 1989, see also subd. (d) above.] Route 104. Route 104 between the

Monroe-Orleans county line and the Orleans-Niagara county line in the Towns of

Ridgeway, Gaines and Murray. (e) Route 18 between Route 279 and the Orleans-Niagara county line in the Towns of

Carlton and Yates. (f) [Eff. until

Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (f) below.] Route 31A. Route 31A from Route 98 to Route 31 in the Towns of Albion, Barre and Shelby, and in the Village of Medina. (f) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also
subd. (f) above.] Route 31A. Route
31A between Route 31 and the Orleans-Monroe county line in the Towns of Shelby, Barre and Clarendon, and in the Village of Medina. (g) CR 65 (Salt Works Road). CR 65 (Salt

Works Road) between Route 31 and a distance of 1.0+- mile north of Route 31 in
the Towns of Shelby and Ridgeway and in the Village of Medina. (h) [Eff. until Feb. 1, 1989, see also
subd. (h) below.] Route 63. Route 63
between West Avenue and Route 104 in the Village of Lyndonville and the Towns
of Yates and Ridgeway. (h) [Eff. Feb. 1, 1989 until Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (h) above and below.] Route 63. Route 63 from

Route 104 to Route 18 in the Village of Lyndonville and the Towns of Ridgeway
and Yates. (h) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (h) above.]
Route 63. Route 63 between the Orleans-Genesee county line and Route 18 in the

Towns of Shelby, Ridgway and Yates, and the Villages of Medina and

Lyndonville. (i) Route 31. Route 31
between the Orleans-Monroe county line and a point 2.3+- miles west of the

Orleans-Monroe county line in the Town of Murray and Village of Holley, RM
31-4502-1238. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8134.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
